title: In high rise residential buildings having height more than 70m, one of the lifts installed shall be a freight lift
clause_text: In high rise residential buildings having height more than 70m, one of the lifts installed shall be a freight lift. The freight lift will be designed in such a way that it shall serve as stretcher lift also.
